trait.name: Aura of Invulnerability
trait.text: An invisible aura forms a 10-foot-radius sphere around the hollyphant for as long as it lives. Any spell of 5th level or lower cast from outside the barrier can't affect creatures or objects within it, even ifthe spell is cast using a higher level spell slot. Such a spell can target creatures and objects within the barrier, but the spell has no effect on them. Similarly, the area within the barrier is excluded from the areas affected by such spells. The hollyphant can use an action to suppress this trait until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting

It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: light 2/day each: bless, cure wounds, protection from evil and good 1/day each: banishment, heal, raise dead, shapechange (into a golden-furred mammoth with feathered wings and a flying speed of 120 ft.), teleport (with no chance of error)

The trumpet also creates a 30-foot cone ofenergy that has one of the following effects, chosen by the hollyphant: Trumpet of Blasting. Each creature in the cone must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 17 (5d6) thunder damage and is deafened for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't deafened. Nonmagical objects in the cone that aren't being held or worn take 35 (10d6) thunder damage. Trumpet of Sparkles. Creatures in the cone must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d8 + 4) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Evil creatures have disadvantage on the saving throw. Good creatures in the cone take no damage.

action.name: Sacred Flame
action.text: Flame-like radiance descends on one creature Thurstwell can see within 60 feet of him. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 4 (1d8) radiant damage, gaining no benefit from cover.

monster.spells: Command, Detect Evil and Good, Guidance, Sacred Flame, Sanctuary, Thaumaturgy

monster.name: Torogar Steelfist

trait.name: Goring Rush
trait.text: Immediately after using the Dash action, Torogar can make one melee attack with his horns.

trait.name: Labyrinthine Recall
trait.text: Torogar can perfectly recall any path he has traveled.

trait.name: Rage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
trait.text: As a bonus action, Torogar can enter a rage that lasts for 1 minute. The rage ends early if Torogar is knocked unconscious or if his turn ends and he hasn't attacked a hostile creature or taken damage since his last turn. While raging, Torogar gains the following benefits: • He has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws. • He deals an extra 3 damage when he hits a target with a melee weapon attack. • He has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

trait.name: Special Equipment
trait.text: Torogar wears gauntlets of jlamingfury (see page 223) and a belt of fire giant strength. Without the belt, his Strength is 21. He also carries a soul coin (see page 225).

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Torogar makes three attacks: two with his scimitars and one with his horns.

action.name: Scimitar
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage, or 17 (2d6 + 10) slashing damage while raging, plus 3 (1d6) fire damage from the gauntlets of flamingfury.

action.name: Horns
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) piercing damage, or 19 (2d8 + 10) piercing damage while raging.

monster.name: Abyssal Chicken

trait.name: Bad Flier
trait.text: The abyssal chicken falls at the end of its turn if it's airborne and the only thing holding it aloft is its flying speed

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The abyssal chicken makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d + 2) damage.

monster.name: Fiendish Flesh Golem
monster.immune: lightning, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monster.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Berserk
trait.text: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

The golem's creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk golem, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The golem must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 40 hit points or fewer, the golem might go berserk again.

trait.name: Immutable Form
trait.text: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
trait.text: Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
trait.text: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The golem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Hellwasp
monster.languages: Infernal, telepathy 300 ft. (with other hellwasps only)

trait.name: Magic Weapons
trait.text: The hellwasp's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The hellwasp's makes two attacks: one with its sting and on wth its sword talons.

action.name: Sting
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the target is also paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the fact on itself on a success.

action.name: Sword Talons
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

monster.name: Nine-Fingers Keene

trait.name: Cunning Action
trait.text: On each of her turns in combat, Nine-Fingers can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Dagger Thrower
trait.text: Nine-Fingers adds double her proficiency bonus to the damage she deals on ranged attacks made with daggers (already factored into her attacks).

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Nine-Fingers attacks three times with her daggers.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 6 piercing damage if it's a ranged attack.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
reaction.text: Nine-Fingers halves the damage that she takes from an attack that hurts her. She must be able to see the attacker.

monster.name: Ulder Ravengard

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Under makes three melee attacks, only one of which can be with his shield.

action.name: +1 Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage when used with two hands.

action.name: Shield
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and Ulder pushes the target 5 feet away from him. Ulder then enters the space vacated by the target. If the target is pushed to within 5 feet of a creature friendly to Ulder, the target provokes an opportunity attack from that creature.

reaction.name: Guardian Strike
reaction.text: If an enemy with 5 feet of Ulder attacks a target other than him, Ulder can make a melee attack against that target.

monster.name: Archduke Zariel Of Avernus
monster.resist: fire, radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
trait.text: Magical darkness doesn't impede Zariel's darkvision.

trait.name: Fiery Weapons
trait.text: Zariel's weapon attacks are magical. When she hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 36 (8d8) fire damage (included in the weapon attacks below).

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Zariel's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 26). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing her appearance), detect evil and good, fireball, invisibility (self only), wall of fire 3/day each: blade barrier, dispel evil and good, finger of death

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: If Zariel fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: Zariel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Regeneration
trait.text: Zariel regains 20 hit points at the start of her turn. If she takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of her next turn. Zariel dies only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Zariel attacks twice with her flail and once with Matalotok. She can substitute Horrid Touch for Matalotok.

action.name: Flail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) piercing damage plus 36 (8d8) fire damage.

action.name: Matalotok (Warhammer)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage, or 19 (2d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands, plus 36 (8d8) fire damage. In addition, the weapon emits a burst of cold that deals 10 (3d6) cold damage to each creature within 30 feet of it.

action.name: Horrid Touch (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Zariel touches one creature within 10 feet of her. The target must succeed on a DC 26 Constitution saving throw or take 44 (8d10) necrotic damage and be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the target is also blinded and deafened. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Teleport
action.text: Zariel magically teleports, along with any equipment she is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

legendary.name: Immolating Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Zariel turns her magical gaze toward one creature she can see within 120 feet of her and commands it to combust. The target must succeed on a DC 26 Wisdom saving throw or take 22 (4d10) fire damage.

monster.resist: Bludgeoning, Piercing, Slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Regeneration
trait.text: Gideon regains 10 hit points at the start of each of his turns. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Gideon is destroyed only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Gideon attacks twice with his fists.

action.name: Fist
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) damage.

action.name: Withering Gaze
action.text: Gideon targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
